      • testAlphanumericSentence

        public void testAlphanumericSentence​(List<String> words)
        Test a "sentence" of alphanumeric words. A sentence is a list of words separated by a space.
        Parameters:
        words - build a sentence from a word stream

      • testAlphanumericWord

        public void testAlphanumericWord​(String word)
        Test alphanumeric word is same for stream as scanner using Alphanumeric generator. Trials increased from the default of 100 to 1000.
        Parameters:
        word - a random alphanumeric word
